sl.sli: SparkDecisionTree: This operator provides support for analysis of incoming tuple data against Apache Spark's decision tree machine learning library.
SparkEnsembleGradientBoostedTrees: This operator provides support for analysis of incoming tuple data against Apache Spark's decision tree ensembles machine learning library.
SparkEnsembleRandomForest: This operator provides support for analysis of incoming tuple data against Apache Spark's decision tree ensembles machine learning library.
